author: hustla187
title: Mr. Claus
review: Who doesn't love Santa Claus? This is a nice model of the iconic Christmas character we all know and love. I really like the white pieces used for the beard which is impressive. This is a really nice model of Santa Claus and should be rereleased.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Seasonal (Christmas) - Santa Review
review:
This is a good little figure to have and it's also fun to play with as well. The build is very easy and we also don't have to worry about stickery. This figure may doesn't have any play features but it's still easy to maneuver. This set also makes a good decoration for Christmas for sure. As I told you in the beginning: It's a good little set to have - even for pieces which you can use for MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure. Happy holidays!

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Review

author: redbeardlegoman
title: Jolly Old Elf
review:
This Santa is a really good part of anyone's Lego Christmas decorating.  It looks good, and comes with a nice printed-brick face.

While not exactly taxing, the building process incorporates some good basic techniques for the beginning MOC builder to school themselves on.  The use of a headlight brick as a hand, for instance, nicely promotes re-thinking the functions of standard pieces.

It could easily be converted into a tree ornament.  It could serve as part of the Christmas grotto in your Lego City shopping mall MOC.  Or, you could just cannibalize it for part, I suppose.

It has limited playability, but it's really meant to be decorative.

Pros

  • It's a good-looking Santa.
  • It comes with a nice printed brick.
  • The building process demonstrates good fundamental techniques for novice MOC builders.
  • Can be employed for various roles, even within your Lego City.

Cons

  • Limited playability.

If you can get your hands on this set, do so.  You won't regret it.
